product_name: Stansport Top Load Dry Bag - 30L - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A great dry bag for rafting, canoeing or anytime you're hauling gear around open water, this 30-liter bag has a watertight ,roll-top seal and compression straps to keep your equipment dry and secure.
short_description: A great dry bag for rafting, canoeing or anytime you're hauling gear around open water, this 30-liter bag has a watertight ,roll-top seal and compression straps to keep your equipment dry and secure.
